challenge(uint256[2],uint256[2][2],uint2.details: Challenge the mint or spend proofs and claim the stake amount if challenge passes.

commit(bytes32).details: Commit a particular proof once the challenge period has ended

params.proofHash: Hash of the proof that needs to be committed

liquidate(address,uint256[2],uint256[2][.details: Liquidate a note to transfer the equivalent amount of dai to the recipient

spend(uint256[2],uint256[2][2],uint256[2.details: Submits the zkSnark proof to be able to spend a note and create two new notes
